statements.select: /* StatMap.SelectStatCmplList - 민원통계 목록 */ SELECT M.DTL_CD AS CDE , M.NM as NAM , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM INFOFMS.FMS_CHSC_FTR_RES WHERE RPR_CUZ_CDE = M.DTL_CD AND RPR_YMD LIKE substr(#searchKeyword#,0,4)||'01'|| '%') AS CNT01 , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM INFOFMS.FMS_CHSC_FTR_RES WHERE RPR_CUZ_CDE = M.DTL_CD AND RPR_YMD LIKE substr(#searchKeyword#,0,4)||'02'|| '%') AS CNT02 , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM INFOFMS.FMS_CHSC_FTR_RES WHERE RPR_CUZ_CDE = M.DTL_CD AND RPR_YMD LIKE substr(#searchKeyword#,0,4)||'03'|| '%') AS CNT03 , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM INFOFMS.FMS_CHSC_FTR_RES WHERE RPR_CUZ_CDE = M.DTL_CD AND RPR_YMD LIKE substr(#searchKeyword#,0,4)||'04'|| '%') AS CNT04 , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM INFOFMS.FMS_CHSC_FTR_RES WHERE RPR_CUZ_CDE = M.DTL_CD AND RPR_YMD LIKE substr(#searchKeyword#,0,4)||'05'|| '%') AS CNT05 , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM INFOFMS.FMS_CHSC_FTR_RES WHERE RPR_CUZ_CDE = M.DTL_CD AND RPR_YMD LIKE substr(#searchKeyword#,0,4)||'06'|| '%') AS CNT06 , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM INFOFMS.FMS_CHSC_FTR_RES WHERE RPR_CUZ_CDE = M.DTL_CD AND RPR_YMD LIKE substr(#searchKeyword#,0,4)||'07'|| '%') AS CNT07 , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM INFOFMS.FMS_CHSC_FTR_RES WHERE RPR_CUZ_CDE = M.DTL_CD AND RPR_YMD LIKE substr(#searchKeyword#,0,4)||'08'|| '%') AS CNT08 , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM INFOFMS.FMS_CHSC_FTR_RES WHERE RPR_CUZ_CDE = M.DTL_CD AND RPR_YMD LIKE substr(#searchKeyword#,0,4)||'09'|| '%') AS CNT09 , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM INFOFMS.FMS_CHSC_FTR_RES WHERE RPR_CUZ_CDE = M.DTL_CD AND RPR_YMD LIKE substr(#searchKeyword#,0,4)||'10'|| '%') AS CNT10 , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM INFOFMS.FMS_CHSC_FTR_RES WHERE RPR_CUZ_CDE = M.DTL_CD AND RPR_YMD LIKE substr(#searchKeyword#,0,4)||'11'|| '%') AS CNT11 , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM INFOFMS.FMS_CHSC_FTR_RES WHERE RPR_CUZ_CDE = M.DTL_CD AND RPR_YMD LIKE substr(#searchKeyword#,0,4)||'12'|| '%') AS CNT12 FROM INFOUSER.CD_DTL_INFO M WHERE MST_CD = '250104'

/* StatMap.SelectFcltStatList - 시설물통계 목록 */ SELECT M.CDE, M.NAM, M.CNT, M.CNT1, M.CNT2, M.CNT3, M.CNT4, M.CNT5 FROM ( SELECT 'F001' CDE, '상수관로' NAM , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM INFOFMS.WTL_PIPE_LM WHERE IST_YMD LIKE #searchKeyword#||'%') CNT , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM INFOFMS.WTL_PIPE_LM WHERE IST_YMD LIKE TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(substr(#searchKeyword#,0,6)||'01',0),'YYYYMM') || '%') CNT1 , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM INFOFMS.WTL_PIPE_LM WHERE IST_YMD LIKE TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(substr(#searchKeyword#,0,6)||'01',-1),'YYYYMM') || '%') CNT2 , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM INFOFMS.WTL_PIPE_LM WHERE IST_YMD LIKE TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(substr(#searchKeyword#,0,6)||'01',-2),'YYYYMM') || '%') CNT3 , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM INFOFMS.WTL_PIPE_LM WHERE IST_YMD LIKE TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(substr(#searchKeyword#,0,6)||'01',-3),'YYYYMM') || '%') CNT4 , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM INFOFMS.WTL_PIPE_LM WHERE IST_YMD LIKE TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(substr(#searchKeyword#,0,6)||'01',-4),'YYYYMM') || '%') CNT5 FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'F002' CDE, '변류시설' NAM , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM INFOFMS.WTL_VALV_PS WHERE IST_YMD LIKE #searchKeyword#||'%') CNT , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM INFOFMS.WTL_VALV_PS WHERE IST_YMD LIKE TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(substr(#searchKeyword#,0,6)||'01',0),'YYYYMM') || '%') CNT1 , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM INFOFMS.WTL_VALV_PS WHERE IST_YMD LIKE TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(substr(#searchKeyword#,0,6)||'01',-1),'YYYYMM') || '%') CNT2 , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM INFOFMS.WTL_VALV_PS WHERE IST_YMD LIKE TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(substr(#searchKeyword#,0,6)||'01',-2),'YYYYMM') || '%') CNT3 , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM INFOFMS.WTL_VALV_PS WHERE IST_YMD LIKE TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(substr(#searchKeyword#,0,6)||'01',-3),'YYYYMM') || '%') CNT4 , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM INFOFMS.WTL_VALV_PS WHERE IST_YMD LIKE TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(substr(#searchKeyword#,0,6)||'01',-4),'YYYYMM') || '%') CNT5 FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'F003' CDE, '소방시설' NAM , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM INFOFMS.WTL_FIRE_PS WHERE IST_YMD LIKE INFOFMS.WTL_FIRE_PS WHERE IST_YMD LIKE TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(substr(#searchKeyword#,0,6)||'01',-1),'YYYYMM') || '%') CNT2 , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM INFOFMS.WTL_FIRE_PS WHERE IST_YMD LIKE TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(substr(#searchKeyword#,0,6)||'01',-2),'YYYYMM') || '%') CNT3 , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM INFOFMS.WTL_FIRE_PS WHERE IST_YMD LIKE TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(substr(#searchKeyword#,0,6)||'01',-3),'YYYYMM') || '%') CNT4 , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM INFOFMS.WTL_FIRE_PS WHERE IST_YMD LIKE TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(substr(#searchKeyword#,0,6)||'01',-4),'YYYYMM') || '%') CNT5 FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'F004' CDE, '상수맨홀' NAM , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM INFOFMS.WTL_MANH_PS WHERE IST_YMD LIKE
